profile.name: Kyle Simpson
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering high-quality software solutions at Getify Solutions
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced developer with a passion for JavaScript, systems programming, and functional programming. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects and driving innovation.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented high-performance systems for scalable data processing and caching.
Developed and maintained multiple libraries and tools, including FPO and CAF.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to drive technical strategy and innovation.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients across various industries.
Contributed to open-source projects, including sourcenetwork/defradb and nodejs/node.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated the defradb database sharding system.
Collaborated with other maintainers to drive project forward.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients across various industries.
Contributed to open-source projects, including nodejs/node.
